hero.title: Healthcare That Fits
hero.subtitle: Book appointments, message your doctor, refill prescriptions, and access your health records—all from your phone. Because your time matters.

features.title: Everything You Need in One Platform
features.subtitle: Built from the ground up for healthcare excellence

scheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
scheduling.description: AI-powered appointment management with automated reminders and intelligent slot optimization.

security.title: Military-Grade Security
security.description: End-to-end encryption, comprehensive audit logs, and automatic compliance reporting.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Real-time insights into practice performance, patient outcomes, and operational efficiency.

multiPlatform.title: Multi-Platform Access
multiPlatform.description: Native iOS, Android, and web applications with seamless synchronization across devices.

telemedicine.title: Telemedicine Ready
telemedicine.description: Built-in video consultations with HD quality, screen sharing, and session recording.

integrations.title: Seamless Integrations
integrations.description: Connect with existing EHR systems, labs, pharmacies, and insurance providers.

patient.title: Your Health, Your Control
patient.intro: Manage your healthcare journey with an intuitive mobile-first experience.
features: Access your complete medical history anytime, anywhere
Secure messaging with your healthcare providers
Prescription refills and lab results in one place
Video consultations from the comfort of home

practice.title: Focus on What Matters: Patient Care
practice.intro: Reduce administrative burden and deliver better outcomes with intelligent tools.
features: Streamlined SOAP notes with voice dictation
AI-assisted diagnosis suggestions and drug interactions
Digital prescriptions sent directly to pharmacies
Comprehensive patient timeline with all interactions
Performance analytics and patient satisfaction metrics

clinic.title: Scale Your Practice Effortlessly
clinic.intro: Enterprise-grade tools to manage operations, staff, and growth.
features: Staff scheduling, permissions, and performance tracking
Revenue cycle management and billing automation
Inventory management for supplies and medications
Custom workflows and automated compliance reporting

compliance.title: Your Trust is Our Foundation
compliance.description: MediCare meets the highest standards for healthcare data protection with dual GDPR and HIPAA compliance, ensuring your data is secure regardless of your location.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Practice?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of healthcare providers already using MediCare
cta.note: No credit card required · 14-day free trial · Cancel anytime

footer.tagline: Next-generation healthcare management for the modern medical ecosystem.
